pesquisa.Buscar: Search by keywords, title, or author

login.texto1: Login with your account. If you don't have one yet,
login.texto2: Would you like to receive a notification when a new article in your area of interest is published?

preferencias.texto1: Sets the preferred language used for reading articles. By default, the device language is used.
preferencias.texto2: Enables or disables night mode for reading the full text of the article. It is possible to disable the light mode during reading.
preferencias.texto3: Sets the font size for reading the full text of the article. It is possible to change the size during reading.

sobre.texto1: Journal of the Graduate Program in Nursing at the Federal University of Santa Catarina. Created in 1992, it is open access and online.
sobre.texto2: It is an international circulation journal. It publishes technical-scientific articles related to the Health area and, in particular, Nursing, with access in Portuguese, English, or Spanish, with one of the article versions obligatorily in English.
sobre.texto3: Disseminates the production of scientific and technological knowledge in health and nursing, valuing the quality of research and the improvement of Health Sciences.

ArticleList.Title: Title:
ArticleList.error: Failed to fetch articles. Please try again later.

Leitura.alerta: The app needs storage access to download files.
Leitura.title: Storage Permission

slide1.title: Welcome to the Texto & Contexto Enfermagem App
slide1.text: Discover new features and resources. In this tab, articles are separated by year of publication. In the upper left corner is the search function. In the upper right corner are the notifications.

slide2.title: Save your favorite articles
slide2.text: The star button allows you to save articles as favorites for easy access or to save for later reading.

slide3.title: Explore Content
slide3.text: Customize your preferences, discover more about Texto & Contexto Enfermagem. If you have issues with the app, don't hesitate to ask for help or access the tutorial again. Adjust the app according to your preferences and learn more about the developers.

slide4.title: Explore the available content of each article
slide4.text: When selecting the desired article, the available information will be displayed: document type, publication date, authors, descriptors, and the article's abstract. Below, you can return to the home screen, favorite the article if you are registered in the app, share, read the PDF within the app, read on the official SciELO website, or download the article if you wish.

slide5.title: Search
slide5.text: By pressing the magnifying glass in the upper left corner of the screen, you will have access to the search tool, being able to choose between 4 forms of sorting. Search by keywords or title.

slide6.title: Notifications
slide6.text: By selecting your topics of interest in the interests tab, you will receive notifications whenever an article with the respective keyword is added.

slide7.title: Interests
slide7.text: Select your preferred themes. If selected during registration, you will receive notifications when an article with a compatible theme is added.

slide8.title: Adjust your experience
slide8.text: Adjust your experience in the Preferences tab. Change the language to the desired one if it is not already set, or change the font size for a more comfortable experience.

password_reset.title: Reset Password
password_reset.code: Enter the code sent to your email

SobreA.Autora: Application developed within the scope of the FAPESC notice n° 21/2022 - Program to support and encourage the consolidation of scientific journals and the Notice nº 7/2023/PROEX/UFSC & PROBOLSAS 2024 Project - Management, dissemination, and translation of knowledge for society and to advance health and nursing practices. Project Coordination: Prof. Dr. Elisiane Lorenzini
SobreA.Consultor: Prototype: Master's Dissertation, Author: Marinalda da Silva Bonelli
SobreA.Desenvolvedor: App developer: Lucas Cabral de Oliveira Ferreira
SobreA.Agradecimentos: We thank the stakeholders, editorial team of the Journal Texto & Contexto Enfermagem and PEN/UFSC Management 2021-2025.
